properties.areaDesc: St Joseph to South Haven MI; Pentwater to Manistee MI; Grand Haven to Whitehall MI; South Haven to Holland MI; Holland to Grand Haven MI; Whitehall to Pentwater MI
properties.headline: Small Craft Advisory issued February 3 at 10:51PM EST until February 5 at 7:00AM EST by NWS Grand Rapids MI
properties.description:
* WHAT...Northeast winds 15 to 25 knots tonight becoming north on
Tuesday. Waves 2 to 5 feet expected.

* WHERE...St Joseph to Manistee.

* WHEN...From 1 AM Tuesday to 7 AM EST Wednesday.

* IMPACTS...Conditions will be hazardous to small craft.

* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Northeast winds will strengthen to 20 to 30
knots off shore overnight and gradually turn to the north into
Tuesday. Waves will gradually work into the nearshore waters,
with the highest waves remaining out over the open lake. The
highest waves in the nearshore waters will be up towards Big and
Little Sable Points and down toward South Haven Tuesday
afternoon and evening.
properties.instruction:
Inexperienced mariners, especially those operating smaller
vessels, should avoid navigating in hazardous conditions.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 AM EST WEDNESDAY
